mapper.sql: t1.id, t1.type, t1.code, t1.addres, t1.price, t1.begin_day, t1.end_day, t1.pay_day, t1.agent, t1.student_num, t1.name, t1.sex, t1.tel, t1.cell_tel, t1.nationality, t1.birthday, t1.school, t1.home_address, t1.email, t1.card_num, t1.shuttle_time, t1.other_note, t1.guardian, t1.swim_survey, t1.basketball_skills, t1.tennis_skills, t1.badminton_skills, t1.karate_skills, t1.inline_skaters_skills, t1.swim_skills, t1.note, t1.date_created, t1.create_id, t1.create_ip, t1.last_updated, t1.update_id, t1.update_ip, t1.del_flag, t1.version, t1.status
mapper.insert: insert into tc_course_web_enroll ( id, type, code, addres, price, begin_day, end_day, pay_day, agent, student_num, name, sex, tel, cell_tel, nationality, birthday, school, home_address, email, card_num, shuttle_time, other_note, guardian, swim_survey, basketball_skills, tennis_skills, badminton_skills, karate_skills, inline_skaters_skills, swim_skills, note, date_created, create_id, create_ip, last_updated, update_id, update_ip, del_flag, version, status ) values ( #{id}, #{type}, #{code}, #{addres}, #{price}, #{begin_day}, #{end_day}, #{pay_day}, #{agent}, #{student_num}, #{name}, #{sex}, #{tel}, #{cell_tel}, #{nationality}, #{birthday}, #{school}, #{home_address}, #{email}, #{card_num}, #{shuttle_time}, #{other_note}, #{guardian}, #{swim_survey}, #{basketball_skills}, #{tennis_skills}, #{badminton_skills}, #{karate_skills}, #{inline_skaters_skills}, #{swim_skills}, #{note}, now(), #{create_id}, #{create_ip}, now(), #{update_id}, #{update_ip}, '0', 0, '0' )
mapper.select: select count(0) from tc_course_web_enroll where id=#{id}

select
from tc_course_web_enroll t1 where 1=1
and t1.del_flag=#{del_flag}
and t1.del_flag='0'
and status=#{status} and t1.name like concat('%',#{name},'%')
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(date_created) >=UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{date1})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(date_created) <=UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{date2})
order by t1.date_created desc

select
from tc_course_web_enroll t1 where 1=1
and t1.del_flag=#{del_flag}
and t1.del_flag='0'
and status=#{status} order by t1.date_created desc
